entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
